your professional profile saved successfully
SES - Professional has registered and waiting for approval.
This email will be sent to the admin for approving the Professional when someone registers as a professional.
New Professional is waiting for Admin Approval.

[header]

Someone has registered as a Professional [professional_name] on your website, please take action to approve or disapprove that Professional.
Click on the link below to visit the Page:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
SES - Professional has registered.
This email will be sent to the admin. When someone registers as a professional.
New Professional is register on your site.

[header]

Someone has registered as a Professional [professional_name] on your website.
Click on the link below to visit the Page:

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
SES - Professional Approved.
This email will be sent to member who gets approved as a professional.
You have been approved as a Professional.

[header]

Congratulations [professional_name]!!! Your profile has been approved by the admin. Click on the following link to view your Document: 

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
SES - Professional gets Disapproved.
This email will be sent to the member who gets disapproved as a Professional.
Your have been disapproved.

[header]

Sorry [professional_name]!!! You have been disapproved by the admin. 

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
SES - Service - Service Created and waiting for approval.
This email will be sent to the admin for approving the Service when someone creates a new Service.
New Service is waiting for Admin Approval.

[header]

Someone has created a new Service [service_name] on your website, please take action to approve or disapprove that Service.

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
SES - Service Approved.
This email will be sent to professional whose service gets approved.
Your Service has been approved.

[header]

Congratulations Your Service [service_name]!!! has been approved by the admin. Click on the following link to view your Service: 


http://[host][object_link]

[footer]
SES - Service gets Disapproved.
This email will be sent to the professional who service gets disapproved.
Your Service gets Disapproved

[header]

Sorry Your Service [service_name] has been disapproved.

http://[host][object_link]

[footer]

This email will be sent to the admin when service is auto approve
